setting.name: *scale
setting.desc: If a text doesn't include a scale value, it will use this.

setting.name: *red
setting.desc: If a text doesn't include a red color value, it will use this.

setting.name: *green
setting.desc: If a text doesn't include a green color value, it will use this.

setting.name: *blue
setting.desc: If a text doesn't include a blue color value, it will use this.

setting.name: *alpha
setting.desc: If a text doesn't include an alpha value, it will use this.

setting.name: *drawDistance
setting.desc: The maximun distance a text can be drawed from the player.

setting.name: *scale3d
setting.desc: Shall the texts simulate they are real 3D-sized objects?

setting.name: *font
setting.accept: default,default-bold, bankgothic, diploma, beckett, clear, verdana, pricedown
setting.desc: Custom fonts for every text aren't supported yet. But with this setting you can set global font for all the texts.
